stochastic_function: lambda emergency_response_level, disaster_severity, public_reaction: {1: 0.6, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.1} if emergency_response_level == 'normal' and disaster_severity == 'mild' and public_reaction in {'positive', 'neutral'} else {1: 0.3, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.3} if emergency_response_level == 'normal' and disaster_severity == 'moderate' and public_reaction in {'positive', 'neutral'} else {1: 0.2, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.3} if emergency_response_level == 'elevated' and public_reaction in {'positive', 'neutral'} else {1: 0.1, 0: 0.2, -1: 0.7}
